name: NSDrawer
desc: A user interface element that contains and displays text, scroll, and browser views, in addition to other view subclasses. DeprecatedDrawers are deprecated and should not be used in modern macOS apps.

items.desc: The receiver’s delegate.

items.desc: If the receiver is open, this method closes it.

items.name: func close(Any?)
items.desc: An action method to close the receiver.

items.name: func open()
items.desc: If the receiver is closed, this method opens it.

items.name: func open(Any?)
items.desc: An action method to open the drawer.

items.name: func open(on: NSRectEdge)
items.desc: Causes the receiver to open on the specified edge of the parent window.

items.name: func toggle(Any?)
items.desc: Toggles the drawer open or closed.

items.desc: The state of the receiver.
